# GitHub Timeline Project Instructions

This is a full-stack web application that visualizes GitHub user repositories in an interactive timeline format.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: React.js application in `client/` directory
- Backend: Node.js/Express server in `server/` directory
- API Integration: GitHub REST API v3 for fetching public repositories
- Responsive design with GitHub-inspired UI

## Key Features
- User input validation for GitHub usernames
- Chronological timeline visualization of repositories
- Responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop
- Shareable URLs for timeline views
- Error handling for invalid users/API errors
- Optional caching layer for API rate limiting

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+) features
- Follow React best practices for component structure
- Implement proper error handling and loading states
- Ensure accessibility with proper ARIA labels
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow GitHub's design patterns and color scheme
